column5: Once in a while I like to take a break from chasing big toothy critters, and enjoy the simple art of skipping a plastic worm under docks for largemouth. At my cottage, it's not even a question if you are going to catch bass - the only question is how many and how big. My little guy Tyler loves bass fishing also - and can cast that Spiderman rod better than most! Last two trips out he managed to catch a few really nice ones, and I did too    It was THIS big.   HEY you said they have no teeth!     Wow dad, nice one!         Pair of beauties caught yesterday on my first and second casts of the day!

That was a sweet report bud.  I only thought of one thing when I seen this pic    Son what ever you do, dont get the hook stuck on that boat cover. Then the Dennis the mennace kicks in.LOL   Great report bud.
Nice report Pete with the youngster,looks like he's a all go kinda guy already!WTG !!!
That was an awesome report. He will remember those fishing trips as long as he lives.
wtg Pete, maybe I should sell all my gear and pick-up a Spiderman combo like Tyler's
Nice report , I remember early trips with my dad like it was yesterday.
Thanks for the report Pete , pretty soon he will be catching more fish then the old man !!!
Love reports with the kids! Good stuff!
mini fish whisperer...  great times. Nothing compares
That's awesome Pete!!!  Quality time spent with your little one... The best!!!
That looks awesome! Nice father and son time!
